      • main

      • addBooks

        public static void addBooks(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> ArrayBook)
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        addBooks - Method that parses the supplied "books.txt" file into a single ArrayList. The ArrayList will be able to contain all book types ( children's books, Cookbooks, Paperbacks, and Periodicals ). Will use the last digit of ISBN to determine what a valid type of books needs to be created.
        Parameters:
        ArrayBook - an ArrayList of Book.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown when the specified pathname does not exist.

      • checkOutBook

        public static void checkOutBook(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> ArrayBook,
                                long ISBN)
        checkOutBook - Method allows a patron to checkout a book using its ISBN. If the book is unavailable, the user will be informed and the program will return back to the main menu. Otherwise, if the book is available, the available count will be decremented and the book information will.
        Parameters:
        ArrayBook - an ArrayList of Book.
        ISBN - the unique number of book.

      • findISBN

        public static java.lang.Object findISBN(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> ArrayBook,
                                        long ISBN)
        findISBN - given an Arraylist of books and a specific ISBN number. Find if the book with the ISBN number exists and if so, return that book; otherwise, null.
        Parameters:
        ArrayBook - an Arraylist of Books
        ISBN - the unique number of book
        Returns:
        returns the Book object if found; otherwise, null.

      • findBooks

        public static void findBooks(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> ArrayBook,
                             java.lang.String findBooks)
        findBooks - performs a case-insensitive search of books that containing the inputed title, and display them.
        Parameters:
        ArrayBook - - ArrayList of Book.
        findBooks - - holding the input from the user to search by title.

      • displayByType

        public static void displayByType(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> ArrayBook)
        displayByType - Method allows a patron to view a list of books with a specific type. The user will also enter a format, diet, genre, or frequency (depending on the type of book) and the book list will display.
        Parameters:
        ArrayBook - - ArrayList of Book.

      • randomBook

        private static void randomBook(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> ArrayBook,
                               int numberOfBooks)
        randomBook - printing random book/s from the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        ArrayBook - - ArrayList of book.
        numberOfBooks - - holding the input from the user of how many books you want to print.

      • write

        public static void write(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> ArrayBook)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        write - Method will call when the program exits, that takes books stored in the array list and save them back to the "Books_Edited.txt" file in the proper format.
        Parameters:
        ArrayBook - - ArrayList of Book.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - Thrown when the file could not be accessed.

      • print

        public static int print(java.util.Scanner input)
        print - Method will call to print the menu again and read the input from the user.
        Parameters:
        input - - read input from the user keyboard.
        Returns:
        - will return the value of the user select.
